hooks.prompt: Check if the file .claude/sraa-audit/audit-state.md exists in the current project. If it exists, read it and provide a brief one-line summary noting that an SRAA audit is in progress (e.g., 'SRAA audit in progress: 2/4 domains complete, 8 findings'). Mention that the user can run /sraa:status for details. If the file does not exist, do nothing and do not mention anything about SRAA audits.
